original: Tassuddānaṁ🔽Gihi’ssa arahā, saha upapattiyā arahā, arahato sabbe dhammā anāsavā, arahā catūhi🔽phalehi samannāgato, evamevaṁ chahi upekkhāhi, bodhiyā buddho, salakkhaṇasamannāgato,
analyzed: tassa uddāna  gihissa arahā saha upapattiyā arahā arahato sabbe dhammā anāsavā arahā catūhi  phalehi samannāgataḥ evam evam chahi upekkhāhi bodhiyā buddhaḥ sa lakkhaṇa samannāgato
translated: The summary:🔽The adept, the one who is an adept from the time of his birth, all the ideas of the adept are without taints, the adept is endowed with four fruits, just so with six equanimities, the Enlightened One with the Enlightened One’s tree of enlightenment, endowed with the characteristics,

original: bodhisatto okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, paṭipannako phalena samannāgato, sabbasaṁyojanānaṁ🔽pahānaṁ arahattanti.
analyzed: bodhisatto okkanta niyāmaḥ carita brahmacariyo paṭipannako phalena samannāgato sabba sayojanāna 🔽pahānam
translated: the being-enlightened, the one who has entered the inevitable, the one who has lived the life of purity, the one who has entered upon the way, endowed with fruit, the abandoning of all fetters, and arahatship.
